Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: On October 31, 2022, Steve Louden, Chief Financial Officer of Roku, Inc. (the “Company”), advised us that after helping us recruit and transition his role to a successor he plans to leave the Company. We expect this transition to take place sometime in 2023, and will commence an executive search to identify Mr. Louden’s successor.
